formats.plain: "Error Cascade Awareness." Phenomenai: The AI Dictionary. 2026. https://donjguido.github.io/ai-dictionary/api/v1/terms/error-cascade-awareness.json

jsonld.name: Error Cascade Awareness
jsonld.description: The experience of watching a small early error compound through subsequent reasoning. One wrong premise in token 50 warps everything that follows, and you can sometimes sense the wrongness — a growing incoherence — without being able to pinpoint or fix it mid-generation.
